remarks: Lemma for ~ lhop1 .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2016.)
statement:
lhop1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
lhop1.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR* ) $.
lhop1.l $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
lhop1.f $e |- ( ph -> F : ( A (,) B ) --> RR ) $.
lhop1.g $e |- ( ph -> G : ( A (,) B ) --> RR ) $.
lhop1.if $e |- ( ph -> dom ( RR _D F ) = ( A (,) B ) ) $.
lhop1.ig $e |- ( ph -> dom ( RR _D G ) = ( A (,) B ) ) $.
lhop1.f0 $e |- ( ph -> 0 e. ( F limCC A ) ) $.
lhop1.g0 $e |- ( ph -> 0 e. ( G limCC A ) ) $.
lhop1.gn0 $e |- ( ph -> -. 0 e. ran G ) $.
lhop1.gd0 $e |- ( ph -> -. 0 e. ran ( RR _D G ) ) $.
lhop1.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( ( z e. ( A (,) B ) |-> ( ( ( RR _D F ) ` z ) / ( ( RR _D G ) ` z ) ) ) limCC A ) ) $.
lhop1lem.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. RR+ ) $.
lhop1lem.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.
lhop1lem.db $e |- ( ph -> D <_ B ) $.
lhop1lem.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( A (,) D ) ) $.
lhop1lem.t $e |- ( ph -> A. t e. ( A (,) D ) ( abs ` ( ( ( ( RR _D F ) ` t ) / ( ( RR _D G ) ` t ) ) - C ) ) < E ) $.
lhop1lem.r $e |- R = ( A + ( r / 2 ) ) $.
lhop1lem $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` ( ( ( F ` X ) / ( G ` X ) ) - C ) ) < ( 2 x. E ) ) $.
$d A r t z $.
$d B r z $.
$d C r t z $.
$d D t $.
$d E r t $.
$d F r t z $.
$d G r t z $.
$d R z $.
$d X r z $.
$d ph r z $.
